name: Carrot Care
description:
Grow and Protect Carrots.

Train them, and build emotional connections.

Make Emotional Connections with your carrots, and name them.

???

Profit!

Carrot Caretaker is a Mouse-Based management/strategy game! Plant carrots, help them reach their full potential, while strategically placing them to keep them safe from  insects that try to eat them! Sell them for profit, or name them and keep them as pets! How much care can you give for your carrots??

- Created for Extra Credits Jam #4

Team: Yubs, Mend, Sagirou

We would love to hear your feedback! Remember to Comment Below!
